titles.title: To repeal the limitation on locality-based comparability adjustments affecting the United States Secret Service Uniformed Division and the United States Park Police.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/22/2002--Introduced. Amends the Miscellaneous Appropriations Act, 2001 to repeal the provision prohibiting locality-based comparability adjustments for members of the U.S. Secret Service Uniformed Division or Park Police from exceeding the rate in effect for pay periods during calendar year 2000.
